japanese:
（やれやれ……。
　島に行く前に親父の言ってたバイトってのが、
　まさか写真のモデルだったとはな）
translation:
(*sigh* I can't believe the part-time job
 Dad mentioned before going to the island
 turned out to be a job as a photo model.)

japanese:
（しかも結婚式場用のＰＲ写真か。
　明らかに俺向きじゃないと思うんだが……）
translation:
(Also, they're PR photos for a wedding ceremony hall.
 I don't think I'm the right one for this job, at all.)

japanese:
（だが、美味しいバイトなことは確かだ。
　ちょっとポーズをとって写真を撮られるだけで
　あの金額なら受けない理由などない！）
translation:
(But one thing's for sure, it's a good paying job.
 I have no reason to decline it, just posing for a few 
 photos. Easy peasy, lemon squeezy!)

japanese:
（待ち合わせ場所は、確かここだよな。
　新婦役のモデルとここで合流しろって話だが……
　誰もいないか）
translation:
(I think the meeting place is around here.
 The bride model is supposed to meet me here...
 but I can't see anyone.)

japanese:
（気合い入れて早く来すぎたな。
　時間まで単語の暗記でもしてるか……）
translation:
(I got here too early in my fervor, huh.
 I guess I'll just study some vocab
 until the appointed time...)

japanese: うーえすーぎさん！　こんにちは！
translation: Ue-sugi-san! Hello!

japanese:
あれ、四葉？
なんだ、久しぶりだな。
translation:
Oh, Yotsuba?
Hey, long time no see.

japanese:
はい、お久しぶりです。
上杉さん、単語帳なんて持って
なにしてるんですか？
translation:
Yeah, it's been a while.
Uesugi-san, what are you doing 
with your vocabulary notebook?

japanese:
ちょっと待ち合わせだ。
相手が来るまで勉強しておこうかと思ってな。
translation:
Just waiting for someone.
I thought I'd study until they arrive.

japanese:
あはは……。
こんなときまで勉強なんて、上杉さんらしいですね。
translation:
Ahaha...
Studying even at a time like this.
Classic Uesugi-san move.

japanese:
でも、のんびりしてると遅刻しちゃいますよ？
さあさあ、早く行きましょう！
translation:
But if we don't hurry, we'll be late.
Come on, let's go!

japanese:
行くって。
今日、お前と出かける約束なんてしてたか？
translation:
Where do you wanna go?
Did we make plans to go somewhere today?

japanese: いえ、してません。
translation: No, we didn't.

japanese:
だよな？
すまん、バイトの人と待ち合わせしてるんだ。
今度、また別の日に――
translation:
Right?
Sorry, I'm meeting someone for a part-time job.
Let's schedule for another day%p-2;――

japanese: そう、ここで待ち合わせです！
translation: That's right! We're meeting here!

japanese: って、んん？
translation: Wha, hmm?

japanese:
今から写真撮影のバイトですよね。
モデルが行かなくっちゃ始まりませんよ？
translation:
We're gonna do a photo shoot now
for the part-time job, aren't we?
They can't start without us, right?

japanese:
待て待て。
なんで四葉がそれを知ってるんだ？
translation:
Hold on, hold on.
Why do you know about that, Yotsuba?

japanese:
それはもちろん、
何を隠そう新婦役はこの私だからです！
translation:
Well, to tell you the truth,
the bride model is me of course!

japanese:
はあぁぁぁ！？
どういう経緯でそうなったんだよ！？
translation:
WHAAAAA?!
How did THAT happen?!

japanese:
先日、らいはちゃんから、
お父さんが困ってると聞いて
何かお手伝いしようと思ったら……。
translation:
The other day from Raiha-chan, I heard that 
your father was in trouble, so I thought I'd help out...

japanese:
是非にと頼まれちゃいまして。
えへへ。
translation: She asked me to do it, and here I am. Ehehe.

japanese: （あの親父、仕事が雑すぎんだろ！！）
translation: (That old man of mine, his work is so SLOPPY!)

japanese:
あれれ？
頭を抱えて、どうしたんですか？　頭痛ですか？
translation:
Oh, what is it?
What's with the facepalm?
Do you have a headache?

japanese:
そんなんじゃねぇよ。
なんつーか……こういう写真で
知ってるやつが相手ってのは……どうなんだ？
translation:
It's not that. 
Something about...taking photos like this 
with someone I know is... How can I put it?

japanese:
私は大丈夫ですよ？
モデルの大役、しっかりとやり遂げてみせます！
translation:
I'm okay with it, ya know?
I'm ready for this job!

japanese: やる気満々だな……。
translation: You're so enthusiastic...

japanese:
ほら、ここまできたら
上杉さんも覚悟を決めてください！
translation:
Come on, Uesugi-san! 
You gotta prepare too!

japanese:
わかってる、お前に言われるまでもない。
受けちまった以上、やるに決まってるだろ？
translation:
I know, I don't need you to tell me.
Since I've accepted the job,
I'm definitely going to do it.

japanese: 上杉さん、お待たせしました。
translation: Uesugi-san, thank you for waiting.

japanese: ああ、四葉も着替え終わって――
translation: Ah, you're done changing too, Yotsuba%p-2;――

japanese: っ！

モデルだってわかってても、
ウエディングドレスを着ると
やっぱりちょっと緊張しちゃいますね。
translation:
Even though I know I'm only a model,
I still feel a little nervous
wearing a wedding dress.

japanese: （四葉……だよな……？）
translation: (That's Yotsuba...right?)

japanese:
どこか変なとこありませんかね？
背中とか、自分ではよく見えませんし。
translation:
Is there anything off about it?
Like my back, since I can't really see it myself.

japanese:
……えっ？
ああ、別に、変なところはないと思うぞ？
translation:
...Huh?
Oh, no, I don't think there's anything outta place.

japanese:
どうですか？
似合ってますか？
translation:
How do I look?
Does it suit me?

japanese: ……馬子にも衣装ってやつだな。
translation: ...Fine feathers make fine birds.

japanese:
まご？
私、上杉のさんの孫じゃないですよ？
translation:
Birds?
I'm not a bird, Uesugi-san!

japanese:
あー、その、なんだ。
えー……つまりだな……。
translation:
Ah, uh, hmmm.
Ehh... In other words...

japanese:
あー？
上杉さん、照れてますね？
translation:
Oooh?
Uesugi-san, are you blushing?

japanese: 照れてねぇよ。
translation: I'm not blushing.

japanese:
隠さなくってもいいんですよ？
上杉さんがそういう反応するときは
照れてるって知ってますから。
translation:
You don't have to hide it, you know?
I know you react like that, when 
you're embarrassed.

japanese: ほらほら、もっとよく見てくださいよー？
translation: Come on, look a little more excited, okay?

japanese:
お、お前はそんなに喜んでていいのか？
結婚前にウェディングドレスを着ると、
婚期が遅れるって話もあるんだぞ？
translation:
Aren't you a bit too happy?
There's a saying that if you wear a wedding dress
before getting married, you'll be late having yours.

japanese:
がーん！
そんなこと言うなんて上杉さんの鬼！
悪魔！　勉強オバケ！
translation:
Whoa! How could you say that, Uesugi-san, you 
demonic dork! You devilish dookie! 
You study monster!

japanese:
おっ？
四葉ちゃん、ドレス似合ってるじゃねーか。
こりゃ、モデルを頼んで正解だったな。
translation:
Oh?
You look good in that dress.
It was definitely a good idea to hire you as the model.

japanese:
あっ、上杉さんのお父さん！
聞いてください、上杉さんったらひどいんですよ？
translation:
Oh, Uesugi-san's father!
You have to hear this! Uesugi-san's being so MEAN!

japanese:
結婚前にウェディングドレスを着ちゃうと
結婚できなくなるとか言うんです！
translation:
He's saying that if you wear a wedding dress
before getting married,
you won't be able to get married!

japanese: そこまで言ってないだろ！？
translation: I never said that!

japanese:
あー、そんなジンクスもあったっけな。
んじゃ、そんときは風太郎に責任取らせるか！
translation:
Oh, right, there was a jinx like that, huh?
Well, then, we'll make Futaro take responsibility
if that happens!

japanese:
ちょっ！　親父！？
なに勝手なこと言ってんだよ！？
translation:
WHA?! DAD?!
What are you talking about, all of a sudden?!

japanese:
上杉さんと私が……結婚？
もし、そんなことになったら……。
translation:
Uesugi-san, and I...marry?
If that happens...

japanese:
らいはちゃんは晴れて
私の妹ってことになるじゃないですか！
translation:
Raiha-chan would officially become my little sister,
right?!

japanese:
どうします上杉さん！？
しちゃいますか、結婚！！
translation:
What are we gonna do, Uesugi-san?!
Why don't we get married?!

japanese: 四葉も、親父の戯言をマジに受けとんな！
translation: Don't take my father's nonsense seriously, Yotsuba!

japanese: あはは、やっぱりダメでしたか。
translation: Ahaha, I guess it was a no-go after all.

japanese:
ガハハハ！
可愛い娘が増えるなら俺は大歓迎だけどな！
translation:
Ohohohoho!
If I can get another cute daughter,
I'll be thrilled!

japanese:
さて、悪いがもうちょい待っててくれ。
こっちの準備ができたら呼ぶからよ。
じゃあ、あとでな。
translation:
Right, sorry, but hold on just a little longer.
I'll call you when everything's ready.
See you later, then.

japanese:
はあ……。
親父め、撮影前からこの調子じゃ先が思いやられる。
translation:
*sigh* I'm worried about what will happen
next if my father is already this goofy even
BEFORE the photo shoot.

japanese:
いや～、すみません。
ちょっと調子にのっちゃいました。
translation:
Wow, sorry about that.
I got a bit carried away.

japanese: いや、俺も変なこと言っちまって悪かったな。
translation: No, I'm sorry too. My bad, I said some weird things.

japanese:
……普段のお前とイメージが違いすぎて、
ちょっとビックリして、な。
translation:
...You just look so different compared to your normal
outfits. I was just a little surprised.

japanese: えっ？　そんなに違いました？
translation: Huh? Am I that different?

japanese:
ああ。
正直、驚いた。
translation:
Yeah.
Honestly, it's astonishing.

japanese:
う～ん……。
それは仕方がないかもしれませんね。
translation:
Hmm...
I guess it can't be helped, then.

japanese:
だって、ウェディングドレスは、
女の子を可愛くする魔法の服なんですから。
translation:
Because a wedding dress is a magical outfit
that makes every girl look cute, after all.

japanese:
魔法？
そんなもの――
translation:
Magic?
That%p-2;――

japanese:
あるわけない、ですか？
でも上杉さんだって使ってるじゃないですか。
translation:
Doesn't exist you wanna say, hm?
But even you're using the magic, Uesugi-san.

japanese: は？　俺が？
translation: Huh? Me?

japanese:
上杉さんのタキシード姿、とっても素敵です。
私も……ドキドキしてるんですよ？
translation:
You look really great in a tuxedo.
I'm...getting all nervous too, you know?

japanese: えっ……。
translation: Huh...?

japanese:
……ふふっ！
ひっかかりましたね？
translation:
...Teehee!
Gotcha!

japanese: あっ、お前まさか！？
translation: AH! You didn't?!

japanese: 嘘ですよーだ♪
translation: That was a lie ♪

japanese:
くあー、また騙された！
しかも同じ手に！
translation:
Aah, I fell for it again!
And with the same trick!

japanese:
上杉さんって、実は素直な人ですよねー。
でも、似合ってるのは本当ですから
安心してください。
translation:
You're actually a pretty honest person,
you know, Uesugi-san?
But it's true that it looks good on you.

japanese: へいへい、ありがとな。
translation: Yeah, yeah, thanks.

japanese:
まったく……。
次は騙されないからな、覚えておけよ。
translation:
Good grief...
I seriously won't be deceived again.
You'd best remember that.

japanese: はい、しっかりと覚えておきますね。
translation: Alright, I'll remember that as good as I can.
